question: Gabriel has $4 in his pocket, $2 in his bag and is given a $10 allowance. How much money does have?
William has $20. He wants to buy pizza for $7 and buy $15 in gas. Does have have enough money?
answerChoices: B) Yes, the total is less than $20

question: Apollo needs $2 to get into a basketball game. He has a dollar bill, 3 quarters, 2 nickels and a dime. How much money does he have? Can he go to the game?
Marcus wants to go to the arcade. Each game costs $0.25. If Marcus has $3 dollars, how many games can he play?
Steve wants buffalo wings. Each buffalo wing costs $0.40 and comes in a pack of 12. How much money does Steve need to buy his buffalo wings?
Kharne wants to buy three new car tires. Car tires cost $75 each, how much money does he need to replace his tires?
